message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. Given its features and value, I'm offering it to you for $20,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can't afford it at $20,000. Would you consider lowering the price to $10,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate you taking the time to consider my offer.  While I understand your position, $10,000 is significantly below the value of this product.  Could you see your way to $17,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I've reviewed the situation and am willing to meet you halfway between my previous offer and yours. I propose $14,000 for the product.
